txt.en: Aid Remmenylf in The Twisted Grove
Talk to Longbough at the Eavespires

'With the big people gone and the branches cleared, I can finally see the forest floor and what is poisoning the roots of all of us. The Twisted Grove, once a place that I called home, has become foul and corrupted.

'The trees there now live and move, but not as Ents or Huorns, they have been twisted into Wood-trolls, dangerous abominations of nature.

'I know not what has caused this all to happen, what has driven my woods to be against me.'
'Hoom, this is most concerning, and perhaps beyond our grasp to save.'
'If the evil within the Twisted Grove spreads, all of Evendim will be shrouded beneath darkness.'
The Twisted Grove was once a place of respite and peace.
Aid Erchiel at The Twisted Grove
The Elves of the Eavespires have some plans for the Twisted Grove.
Aid Lithuifin in The Twisted Grove
Longbough is at the Eavespires.\n\nLongbough will want to hear that the evil at the Twisted Grove is more powerful than previously thought.
